sentences: Aleksa Asanovic is professor of cello and solo cellist, teacher, conductor, director and founder of the first school of music for strings in Montenegro.
Asanovic was born on 14 May 1945, in Podgorica (Montenegro).
He graduated from the Music Academy in the class of Victor Jakovčić in Belgrade and then in the class of André Navarra in Skopje.
He has performed with more than 40 renowned pianists and conductors in Europe and America.
In April 2013 he performed several pieces at the Podgorica Spring Time Chamber Music Festival, celebrating the 20th anniversary of the Andre Navarra Music School.
